hero.title: Juan Manuel Paredes
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Welcome to my portfolio. Here you can find my projects and download my resume.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description: Mechatronic Engineer turned Full Stack Developer, blending solid engineering foundation with passion for software development. My transition into web technology has been driven by the pursuit of creating digital solutions that transform industrial and business processes.
about.story: With experience in industrial automation and deep understanding of complex systems, I've channeled these skills toward developing robust and scalable web applications. My mechatronics background allows me to approach programming challenges from a unique perspective, combining systematic thinking with technical creativity.
about.achievements: I've led the development of innovative digital tools, including a comprehensive coffee milling control system that digitized manual processes through integrated web applications. This project demonstrates my ability to transform real-world needs into effective technological solutions.
about.focus: My focus centers on creating exceptional user experiences backed by solid backend architectures, applying engineering principles to ensure performance, scalability, and maintainability in every project.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore what I have built, each with its own story and technology.
